name: Pink Flower Handmade Card (green)
description: This handmade card has been left blank inside for your message, and comes with a white envelope. This single fold card is A6 in size (105 x 147mm) and has been made from green and yellow coloured cardboard, yellow coloured paper and pink recycled wrapping paper. The pink recycled wrapping paper has a pale white petal motif on it. All parts have been hand cut with scissors and glued to each other using doubled sided sellotape. I designed the card myself and hope that you like it!

name: Hearts Handmade Card (mini)
description:
This handmade card has been left blank inside for your message, and comes with a white envelope. This cream single fold mini card measures 74 x 105mm and has been made from cream, dark red, wine red and strawberry red coloured cardboard. It also contains strawberry red coloured paper and newspaper. 

The design of the card consists of three small hearts in the middle of the card - two of the outer hearts are dark red and the inner middle heart is strawberry red. Above the strawberry red heart is a larger wine red heart with a small newspaper heart (the same size as the smaller hearts below) layered over it . All parts have been cut with scissors or a hole punch and glued to each other using doubled sided sellotape. I designed the card myself and hope that you like it!

name: Newspaper Flower Handmade Card (orange)
description: This handmade card has been left blank inside for your message, and comes with a white envelope. This single fold card is A6 in size (105x147mm) and has been made from orange and red coloured cardboard, red coloured paper and newspaper. All parts have been hand cut with scissors and glued to each other using doubled sided sellotape. I designed the card myself and hope that you like it!
